401.title: No Permission
401.content1: You don't have Permission to review this page for now.
401.content2: If you need to review content in this page,
401.content3: Please contact Manager in your company.

404.title: Page Not Exits
404.content1: The Page you try to review is not exist.
404.content2: If you need to review content in this page,

groupName.length: Length must be between 1 and 30 characters

date.startBeforeEnd: Start date cannot be later than end date
date.endAfterToday: End date cannot be earlier than today
